import React from 'react' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import styles from './login.module.css' import background from '../Login/Asset/img/Login.png' // import google from '../Login/Asset/img/google.png' import { Container, Form, Button, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; const login = () => { const form_input_style = { borderRadius: '50px', height: '55px', borderStyle: 'solid', borderColor: 'White', borderWidth: '3px', backgroundColor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0)' } const background_style = { backgroundImage: `url(${background})`, position: 'absolute', float: 'left', width: '100%', height: '100vh', backgroundRepeat: 'no-repeat', backgroundSize: 'cover', borderStyle: 'none', backgroundPosition: 'center', zIndex: 1 } const title_style = { textAlign: 'right', fontFamily: 'AvertaStdCY_Bold', paddingRight: '25px', color:'White', } const button_style = { fontFamily: 'AvertaStdCY_Bold', backgroundColor: 'White', color:'black', borderRadius:'25px', width: ' 100px' } const google_style = { width:'50px', backgroundColor:'White' } const login_with_google_style = { backgroundColor:'red', } return ( <>
